name: Benjamin
abilityDescription: Any allied Hero in Line of Sight of Benjamin gets +1 die to all rolls.

name: Leah
abilityDescription: At any point during her activation, Close Allies may Move 1 Space. (This Move doesn't trigger Guard Reaction. Maximum 1 Move per Ally per turn.)

name: Angel Eyes
abilityDescription: For each crit she rolls on an attack, you may unexhaust one card from an ally.

name: The Wanderer
abilityDescription: For each Wound he deals, you may heal one Wound from an Ally.
